project.title: Webofart
project.aim: This project aim is to provide platform to sell and buy art. User can also start and others can particate, The one with the highest big takes away the art at the end of auction

details.title: Features
points: User is able to start and conclude the auctions
User can filter art with various categories

nextProject.title: Doez
nextProject.aim: This website helps employees to keep track of all the clients and employees working on various projects. It gives functionality to create project with necessary details and assign the job role of employees in a project. It is necessary to keep track of employees in an organisation for better performance and efficient product.

overView.title: Resource Details with list of project he/she is allocated
Editing of project details with dynamic search of resources

details.title: Features
points: In an organisation it is very crucial to keep track of resources during development process

It helps to work efficiently. I think that a web application like doez is very beneficial for people to supervise all the project details and resource within the organisation. The dynamic aspect of the system helps to support the future needs in an organisation. It also provides ease way for resources to client information for communication purpose
The design of the system is simple and elegant which helps the user to perform its task without any difficulties
